strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy weekend! Here are some things going on this weekend you might enjoy:

  • Roots: The FreshGrass festival begins today! Get your tickets and head out for a good time!
  • On bikes: Go find the best places to watch the Joe Martin Stage Race this weekend! 
  • The big big screen: Get cozy at the Drive-In in Fayetteville and prepare for some superhero madness this weekend. 
  • Raise a glass: There is a beer festival and fundraiser tomorrow at The Grove in Lowell. 
  • Kneepads: Bentonville Parks Mountain Bike Kids Camp is Saturday. 
  • Heroes Ruck & Rally: A free 5k walk or 1-mile walk is taking place in Rogers tomorrow for national heroes. 
  • Stretch and pose: Bring your mat and attend the free yoga series at the Botanical Garden of the Ozarks on Saturday. 
  • Tunes: If you’re near JJ’s Live in Fayetteville or the Railyard in Rogers this weekend, there are some great musicians you might want to hear. 

Have a blast and be safe! We'll see you Monday!
